title: Can I search Radare's help system?
content:
Radare2 seems to have thousands of commands. Is there a way to search all of those commands?

Like let's say I want to find all commands that had rot (for rot13), is there a method to do this?

answers_data.content:
You can try to find a command with searching over all help texts like this:

?*

And to filter the result simply add this:

?*~keyword
You can use ?*~... to do interactive search in all help commands:

comments.text: Can you validate the answer then?
@EvanCarroll this is not exactly what defragger wrote as the 3 dots are not a placeholder for a keyword, if you enter this command as is, you can do interactive search in all help commands
